UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Promising antibacterial efficacy of arenicin peptides against the emerging opportunistic pathogen Mycobacterium abscessus
Literature.Author: Casanova M, Maresca M, Poncin I, Point V, Olleik H, Boidin-Wichlacz C, Tasiemski A, Mabrouk K, Cavalier JF, Canaan S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human bronchial epithelial cells BEAS-2B:50% Cytotoxicity=>100 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=39.3±3.2 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium abscessus subsp. abscessus CIP 104536T(MIC50=>100µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>100µM),Human renal carcinoma A498(50-60% Cytotoxicity=36.6±0.9µM)
